content: But I guess the emphasis of the capital management framework and the gearing ratio of 10% to 20% is really to provide that ability to be able to return value to the shareholders, while being able to continue to invest in our major projects over the next few years. And the last question on this is the new guidance, the guidance thatâs been put out to your $125 million to $153 million, if we adjust that to the old conversion factor, adding the BHP production until May, you get a range of 190 million barrels to 198 million barrels for the calendar year â22, including the BHP assets for the full year.
